title: THE BLACK DAHLIA MURDER Reschedules Mexico & South America Shows For Health Reasons
description: Brian Eschbach is focusing on his health at the moment. The post THE BLACK DAHLIA MURDER Reschedules Mexico & South America Shows For Health Reasons appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: Brian Eschbach is focusing on his health at the moment.
text: The Black Dahlia Murder has rescheduled their Mexico and South American shows due to vocalist Brian Eschbach wanting to take a step back and "reevalute my approach to life and focus on my health." The new shows will take place this December with the addition of Gatecreeper. Eschbach also promises that The Black Dahlia Murder will still play their shows at Sonic Temple and Welcome To Rockville this spring. "Brian here. I’d like to apologize to our Latin American fans for the postponement of our February shows," wrote Eschbach. "We have rescheduled for December and joining us is the mighty Gatecreeper. As everyone knows it’s been an intense 4 years in the world and within The Black Dahlia Murder. All of this has forced me to take a hard look in the mirror and reevalute my approach to life and focus on my health. I want to thank my friends, family, and bandmates for their continuous love and support. I and the rest of the band look forward to seeing you all at Sonic Temple and Welcome To Rockville this spring. html:
The Black Dahlia Murder has rescheduled their Mexico and South American shows due to vocalist Brian Eschbach wanting to take a step back and "reevalute my approach to life and focus on my health." The new shows will take place this December with the addition of Gatecreeper. Eschbach also promises that The Black Dahlia Murder will still play their shows at Sonic Temple and Welcome To Rockville this spring.

"Brian here. I’d like to apologize to our Latin American fans for the postponement of our February shows," wrote Eschbach. "We have rescheduled for December and joining us is the mighty Gatecreeper. As everyone knows it’s been an intense 4 years in the world and within The Black Dahlia Murder. All of this has forced me to take a hard look in the mirror and reevalute my approach to life and focus on my health. I want to thank my friends, family, and bandmates for their continuous love and support. I and the rest of the band look forward to seeing you all at Sonic Temple and Welcome To Rockville this spring.

"All ticket holders who want a refund can get it at the point of purchasing, (if it was online you’ll have to request your refund via ticket seller) from February 21st and onwards, the limit date will be April 21st."
